a.title: Strong Foundations Honor Band - January 14, 2021 - East High School, Sioux City

div.div: Strong Foundations Honor Band - January 14, 2021 - East High School, Sioux City

span.style: vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; background-color: transparent; font-family: Arial; font-size: 24px; color: rgb(192, 0, 0);

p.span:
CCE will begin delivering sack lunches to all four communities March 30. Please read attached flyer. CCE Meal Flyer
Attention Parent and Students,
We are going to occasionally send home meals that need to be heated up in the microwave. We will be sending directions in the sacks with these meals.
Mr. Ribs: Put Mr. Rib on a microwaveable plate/dish and heat for 30 seconds. Flip Mr. Rib and microwave another possible 30 seconds.
School is suspended until further notice for the COVID-19 virus. A letter to Parents about the school closure, please read.

strong.span: What you need to know about flu season and the Coronavirus.

br.br:
CCE 2018-2019 Yearbooks are for sale, $40.00 each.
Stop by the Office in Royal to buy your copy today.

div.h2:
SALE: Clay Central Everly School District is selling the contents of the Everly Building.
Please contact Don Seymour
(515) 418-7244 for more information.
Check back often, new items added every week!
